soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained deep loamy soil

land_preparation: Plough deeply and level the field. Dig pits of 50x50x50 cm and fill with top soil mixed with 10 kg of FYM.
seed_selection: Use disease-free sword suckers weighing about 500 g or tissue culture plantlets.
sowing_method: Plant suckers in pits at the center, press soil firmly around.
spacing: 2m x 2m (for tall varieties) or 1.8m x 1.8m (for dwarf varieties)
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate immediately after planting. Then once in 4-7 days depending on soil and season. Provide drip irrigation for efficiency.
fertilizer_management: Apply 200 g N, 50 g P, 300 g K per plant in three split doses at 3, 5, and 7 months after planting. Include FYM at planting.
weed_management: Hand weeding or mulching with dry leaves/plastic to suppress weeds.
pest_and_disease_management: Control rhizome weevil by dipping suckers in chlorpyriphos. Manage Sigatoka leaf spot by spraying carbendazim or propiconazole at first sign.

growth_stages.description: Rapid leaf and stem development; requires adequate water and nutrients.
Inflorescence emergence; continue irrigation and side-dress fertilizer.
Bunch development and maturity; protect from wind and pests.

harvesting.harvest_time: When fruits are fully developed but still green; 11-12 months after planting.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut the bunch with a curved knife, leaving a portion of the stalk for handling.

post_harvest_handling: De-hand bunches, wash in clean water, treat with fungicide, and pack in ventilated boxes. Ripen with ethylene if required.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy or sandy loam

land_preparation: One deep ploughing followed by 2-3 harrowings to achieve fine tilth. Level the field.
seed_selection: Certified seeds of high-yielding varieties (e.g., BH 902, RD 2035).
sowing_method: Broadcasting or drilling in rows. Seed rate 100 kg/ha.
spacing: Row spacing 22-25 cm, plant spacing 5-7 cm.
irrigation_schedule: Pre-sowing irrigation, then first irrigation at crown root initiation (20-25 DAS), second at tillering (40-45 DAS), third at flowering (70-75 DAS), and fourth at grain filling (95-100 DAS).
fertilizer_management: Apply 60 kg N, 30 kg P, 20 kg K per hectare. Full P and K at sowing, N in two splits: half at sowing and half at first irrigation.
weed_management: Pre-emergence application of Pendimethalin or hand weeding at 30-35 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Control aphids with imidacloprid; manage leaf rust with propiconazole.

growth_stages.description: Formation of side shoots; apply nitrogen.

harvesting.harvest_time: When straw turns yellow and grains are hard (mid-March to April).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Manual harvesting with sickle or combine harvester.

post_harvest_handling: Thresh, clean, and dry grains to 12% moisture before storage.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained sandy loam rich in organic matter

land_preparation: Plough field to fine tilth, add 20-25 t/ha FYM, form beds and channels.
seed_selection: Treat seeds with Trichoderma viride @ 4 g/kg seed; use high-yielding hybrids like Priya or Green Long.
sowing_method: Direct sowing on raised beds, 2-3 seeds per hill, later thin to one plant.
spacing: Row to row 1.5-2 m, plant to plant 0.6-0.9 m (depending on trellis system).
irrigation_schedule: Light irrigation every 3-4 days; critical stages: flowering and fruit development. Drip irrigation recommended.
fertilizer_management: Basal: 25 t FYM + 50 kg N, 30 kg P, 30 kg K/ha. Top dress with 50 kg N after 30 and 60 DAS.
weed_management: Mulching with plastic or straw; hand weeding at 20 and 40 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Fruit fly: install pheromone traps; use neem spray. Powdery mildew: spray wettable sulfur.

growth_stages.description: Rapid vine elongation and branching; provide trellis.
Fruit set and development; regular picking.

harvesting.harvest_time: 55-60 days after sowing; harvest young tender fruits every 3-4 days.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Hand picking with scissors, avoid damage.

post_harvest_handling: Sort, grade, pack in ventilated crates; store at 12-15°C.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loam or clay loam

land_preparation: Plough and harrow to get fine tilth; level field.
seed_selection: Certified seeds of varieties like T9, Pant U-19, or Shekhar-2; treat with Rhizobium culture.
sowing_method: Broadcasting or line sowing; seed rate 20-25 kg/ha for pure crop.
spacing: Row spacing 30 cm, plant spacing 10 cm.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate immediately after sowing; then at branching, flowering and pod development if no rain.
fertilizer_management: 20 kg N, 40 kg P, 20 kg K per hectare as basal. No need for top dressing if Rhizobium effective.
weed_management: Pre-emergence Pendimethalin + one hand weeding at 30 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Control pod borer with quinalphos; manage yellow mosaic virus by resistant varieties and vector control.

harvesting.harvest_time: When pods turn black and dry (80-90 days after sowing).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Pull out plants or cut at base, sun dry, thresh.

post_harvest_handling: Clean, dry grains to 9% moisture; store in gunny bags with proper fumigation.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained laterite or loamy soil rich in organic matter

land_preparation: Plant cuttings in pits near standards (support trees). Pits of 0.5 m³ filled with top soil and FYM.
seed_selection: Select rooted cuttings from high-yielding vines (e.g., Panniyur-1, Karimunda).
sowing_method: Plant 2-3 cuttings per pit at the base of support tree, stake them.
spacing: 2-3 m between plants, depends on support tree arrangement.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate during dry periods (Nov-May) every 7-10 days; avoid water stress.
fertilizer_management: Apply FYM 10 kg, N 100 g, P 40 g, K 150 g per vine per year in two splits (May-June and Sept-Oct).
weed_management: Mulching and hand weeding around base; control weeds on standards.
pest_and_disease_management: Pollu beetle: spray quinalphos; foot rot: drench with Bordeaux mixture.

growth_stages.description: First year: vine climbs and establishes.
Second and third years: rapid vine elongation.
From 4th year onward: spikes appear, berries develop.

harvesting.harvest_time: When berries turn from green to yellow or red (Jan-Feb in plains, later in hills).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Hand pick spikes, separate berries.

post_harvest_handling: Berries blanched in hot water, sun dried till they turn black, then stored.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Sandy loam to loamy soil with organic matter

land_preparation: Deep plough, add 20 t/ha FYM, form ridges and furrows or raised beds.
seed_selection: Hybrid seeds (e.g., Pusa Hybrid-3, Pusa Samridhi) treated with Trichoderma.
sowing_method: Direct sowing on ridges, 2 seeds per hill, later thin.
irrigation_schedule: Weekly irrigation; critical at flowering and fruit set; mulching helps.
fertilizer_management: Basal: 50 kg N, 30 kg P, 30 kg K + FYM. Top dress with 50 kg N at 30 and 60 DAS.
weed_management: Mulch with plastic; hand weed at 30 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Fruit fly: pheromone traps; powdery mildew: sulfur spray.

harvesting.harvest_time: 60-65 days after sowing; pick immature tender fruits.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut with stalk using sharp knife.

post_harvest_handling: Grading, packing in mesh bags; store in cool place.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained sandy loam to clay loam

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 25 t/ha FYM, prepare beds or ridges.
seed_selection: Hybrid seeds like Pusa Purple Long, Arka Keshav; treat with Trichoderma.
sowing_method: Nursery raising; transplant 30-35 days old seedlings on ridges.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate immediately after transplant, then weekly. Critical: flowering and fruiting.
fertilizer_management: Basal: 50 kg N, 50 kg P, 50 kg K + FYM. Top dress with 50 kg N at 30 and 60 DAT.
weed_management: Mulching with plastic; hand weeding at 30 and 50 DAT.
pest_and_disease_management: Shoot and fruit borer: spray emamectin benzoate; little leaf: remove infected plants.

harvesting.harvest_time: When fruits attain marketable size (50-60 DAT); regular picking.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Hand picking with stalk.

post_harvest_handling: Sort, pack in crates, store at 12-15°C.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy soil rich in organic matter

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 30 t/ha FYM, form beds.
seed_selection: Hybrid seeds (e.g., Golden Acre, Pusa Drumhead).
sowing_method: Nursery raising; transplant 4-5 week old seedlings.
irrigation_schedule: Light irrigation after transplant, then weekly. Avoid water stress during head formation.
fertilizer_management: Basal: 100 kg N, 75 kg P, 75 kg K + FYM. Top dress with 50 kg N at 30 and 50 DAT.
weed_management: Mulching; hand weeding at 20 and 40 DAT.
pest_and_disease_management: Diamondback moth: spinosad; black rot: avoid overhead irrigation and use certified seeds.

harvesting.harvest_time: When heads are firm and compact (75-100 DAT).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut heads with a sharp knife, leave few wrapper leaves.

post_harvest_handling: Trim, pack in crates, store at 0-1°C with 95% RH.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Forest loam rich in organic matter, well-drained

land_preparation: Clear undergrowth, dig pits of 60x60x45 cm, fill with top soil and FYM.
seed_selection: Rhizome bits from high-yielding clones (e.g., Appangala-1, Mudigere-1) or seedlings.
sowing_method: Plant rhizomes in pits during May-June; cover with soil.
spacing: 2m x 2m (for pure crop) or adjusted in shade gardens.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate during dry months (Dec-May) once a week; use sprinklers.
fertilizer_management: Apply 75 kg N, 75 kg P, 150 kg K per ha per year in two splits (June and Sept) with FYM 10 t/ha.
weed_management: Hand weeding 3-4 times a year; mulching with leaves.
pest_and_disease_management: Rhizome rot: drench with copper oxychloride; shoot borer: spray quinalphos.

growth_stages.description: First year: tillers emerge, plant establishes.
From 3rd year: panicles appear, capsules develop.

harvesting.harvest_time: When capsules turn green (Aug-Nov), harvested every 15-20 days.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Hand pick ripe panicles, separate capsules.

post_harvest_handling: Capsules washed, dried in curing house (50°C) till moisture 10-12%, then polished and graded.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy soil rich in organic matter

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 25 t/ha FYM, form beds.
seed_selection: Hybrid seeds (e.g., Pusa Snowball, Pusa Deepali).
sowing_method: Nursery raising; transplant 4-5 week old seedlings.
irrigation_schedule: Light irrigation after transplant, then weekly. Critical: curd initiation and development.
fertilizer_management: Basal: 100 kg N, 80 kg P, 80 kg K + FYM. Top dress with 50 kg N at 30 and 50 DAT.
weed_management: Mulching; hand weeding at 20 and 40 DAT.
pest_and_disease_management: Diamondback moth: spinosad; downy mildew: mancozeb spray.

harvesting.harvest_time: When curds are compact, white, and marketable (80-110 DAT).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut curds with surrounding leaves to protect.

post_harvest_handling: Cool immediately, pack in crates, store at 0°C with 95% RH.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy soil

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 10 t/ha FYM, level field.
seed_selection: Certified seeds of varieties like Sadhana, RCr-41; split seeds before sowing.
sowing_method: Broadcasting or line sowing; seed rate 20-25 kg/ha.
spacing: Row 30 cm, plant 10 cm (if line sown).
irrigation_schedule: Light irrigation after sowing, then every 7-10 days; critical at flowering and seed filling.
fertilizer_management: Basal: 20 kg N, 30 kg P, 20 kg K + FYM. Top dress with 20 kg N at 30 DAS.
weed_management: Hand weeding at 20 and 40 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Aphids: dimethoate; powdery mildew: sulfur spray.

growth_stages.description: Leaf growth; if grown for leaves, harvest at this stage.

harvesting.harvest_time: For seeds: when 50% seeds turn yellow (90-110 DAS); for leaves: 30-45 DAS.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut plants at base, dry, thresh for seeds.

post_harvest_handling: Dry seeds to 9% moisture; store in cool dry place.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Deep well-drained black cotton or loamy soil

land_preparation: Deep ploughing, harrowing, leveling; apply 10 t/ha FYM.
seed_selection: Certified hybrid seeds (e.g., Bt cotton hybrids) treated with fungicide.
sowing_method: Line sowing on ridges or flat beds; seed rate 3-5 kg/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate at critical stages: seedling, flowering, boll development; 4-5 irrigations depending on rainfall.
fertilizer_management: Apply 120 kg N, 60 kg P, 60 kg K per ha. Basal: half N + full P,K. Top dress remaining N at 30 and 60 DAS.
weed_management: Pre-emergence Pendimethalin + hand weeding at 40 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Sucking pests: imidacloprid; bollworms: sprays as per ETL; use Bt cotton for resistance.

harvesting.harvest_time: When bolls burst (160-180 DAS); pick in multiple rounds.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Hand picking kapas (seed cotton) from open bolls.

post_harvest_handling: Dry kapas in sun, grade, and gin to separate lint and seed.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Sandy loam rich in organic matter

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 20 t/ha FYM, form raised beds.
seed_selection: Hybrid seeds (e.g., Pusa Sanyog, Malini) treated with Trichoderma.
sowing_method: Direct sowing on beds, 2 seeds per hill, later thin.
irrigation_schedule: Light irrigation every 3-4 days; critical at flowering and fruit set. Drip preferred.
fertilizer_management: Basal: 50 kg N, 30 kg P, 30 kg K + FYM. Top dress with 50 kg N at 30 and 50 DAS.
weed_management: Mulch with plastic; hand weeding at 30 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Fruit fly: pheromone traps; downy mildew: mancozeb spray.

harvesting.harvest_time: 50-55 DAS; pick young tender fruits every 2-3 days.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Hand picking with stalk.

post_harvest_handling: Grading, packing in crates, store at 10-15°C.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Sandy loam to loamy well-drained

land_preparation: Plough and dig pits of 45x45x45 cm, fill with top soil + 10 kg FYM.
seed_selection: Seeds from high-yielding types (PKM-1, PKM-2) or stem cuttings.
sowing_method: Direct sowing of seeds in pits (3 seeds per pit) or planting cuttings.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate once a week initially, then as needed. Critical during flowering and pod development.
fertilizer_management: Apply 25 kg FYM, 100 g N, 50 g P, 50 g K per plant per year in two splits (June and Oct).
weed_management: Hand weeding around base; mulching.
pest_and_disease_management: Leaf caterpillar: spray quinalphos; powdery mildew: sulfur.

harvesting.harvest_time: When pods are tender (50-60 cm long), 8-9 months after planting; continuous picking.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Hand picking or using long pole with hook.

post_harvest_handling: Sort, pack in ventilated bags; store in cool place.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy soil rich in organic matter

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 20 t/ha FYM, form raised beds.
seed_selection: Healthy, disease-free cloves from varieties like Agrifound White, Yamuna Safed.
sowing_method: Plant cloves 5-7 cm deep, pointed end up; seed rate 400-500 kg/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Light irrigation immediately after sowing, then weekly. Stop irrigation 2 weeks before harvest.
fertilizer_management: Apply 100 kg N, 50 kg P, 50 kg K + FYM. Half N and full P,K basal; half N top dress at 30 DAS.
weed_management: Pre-emergence Pendimethalin + hand weeding at 40 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Thrips: dimethoate; purple blotch: mancozeb spray.

harvesting.harvest_time: When tops turn yellow and bulbs are mature (130-150 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Uproot plants, tie in bundles, cure in shade.

post_harvest_handling: Clean, grade, store in cool dry place with good ventilation.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy or red sandy loam

land_preparation: Plough deeply, dig pits 1x1x1 m, fill with top soil + 50 kg FYM + 1 kg SSP.
seed_selection: Cuttings from recommended varieties (Thompson Seedless, Bangalore Blue).
sowing_method: Plant rooted cuttings in pits during Dec-Jan.
spacing: 3m x 3m or 4m x 2m depending on trellis system.
irrigation_schedule: Drip irrigation daily in summer, weekly in winter. Critical: flowering, berry development.
fertilizer_management: Apply FYM 20 kg/vine, N 500 g, P 250 g, K 500 g per vine per year in three splits.
weed_management: Mulching with plastic; hand weeding.
pest_and_disease_management: Powdery mildew: wettable sulfur; thrips: imidacloprid; remove affected bunches.

harvesting.harvest_time: When berries attain TSS (March-April); harvest in early morning.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut bunches with secateurs, handle gently.

post_harvest_handling: Pre-cool, grade, pack in ventilated boxes, store at 0-1°C.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained sandy loam to loam, tolerates poor soils

land_preparation: Plough once, harrow; no heavy tillage needed.
seed_selection: Certified seeds of varieties like AK-21, Paiyur-1; treat with Rhizobium.
sowing_method: Broadcasting or line sowing; seed rate 30-40 kg/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Rainfed crop; one irrigation at pod filling if dry.
fertilizer_management: Apply 15 kg N, 40 kg P per ha as basal. No K needed.
weed_management: One hand weeding at 30 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Pod borer: spray quinalphos; leaf spot: mancozeb.

harvesting.harvest_time: When pods turn brown (100-110 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Pull plants, sun dry, thresh.

post_harvest_handling: Clean, dry grains, store in bags.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Deep well-drained loamy soil

land_preparation: Dig pits 1x1x1 m, fill with top soil + 20 kg FYM + 1 kg SSP.
seed_selection: Seeds from high-yielding trees or grafted seedlings (for uniformity).
sowing_method: Plant seedlings in pits during June-July.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate weekly in dry months; critical during flowering and fruit development.
fertilizer_management: Apply 50 kg FYM, 500 g N, 200 g P, 600 g K per tree per year in two splits (June and Oct).
weed_management: Basin weeding and mulching.
pest_and_disease_management: Shoot borer: remove affected parts; fruit rot: avoid injury and spray copper fungicide.

harvesting.harvest_time: When fruits mature (summer months), 3-4 years after planting; fruits ripen in 3-5 months after flowering.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut fruit stalk with knife, lower carefully.

post_harvest_handling: Store at ambient; ripe fruits can be refrigerated; process bulbs for canning.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy or black soil

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, level field.
seed_selection: Certified seeds of hybrids like CSH-16, CSV-15.
sowing_method: Line sowing or drilling; seed rate 8-10 kg/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate at critical stages: seedling, vegetative, flowering, grain filling. 3-4 irrigations.
fertilizer_management: Apply 80 kg N, 40 kg P, 40 kg K per ha. Basal: half N + full P,K; top dress at 30 and 60 DAS.
weed_management: Pre-emergence atrazine + hand weeding at 30 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Shoot fly: carbofuran in furrows; grain mold: use tolerant varieties.

harvesting.harvest_time: When grains are hard and moisture 20% (100-110 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut earheads, dry, thresh.

post_harvest_handling: Dry grains to 12% moisture, store in bins.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy alluvial soil

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add FYM 10 t/ha.
seed_selection: Certified seeds of JRO-524, JRC-321 etc.; treat with fungicide.
sowing_method: Broadcasting or line sowing; seed rate 8-10 kg/ha.
spacing: Row 30 cm, plant 5-7 cm (thin after emergence).
irrigation_schedule: Rainfed; supplemental irrigation if dry spell >2 weeks.
fertilizer_management: Apply 60 kg N, 30 kg P, 30 kg K per ha. Basal: half N + full P,K; top dress at 30 DAS.
weed_management: Hand weeding at 20 and 40 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Semilooper: spray quinalphos; stem rot: remove infected plants.

growth_stages.description: Rapid stem elongation; main fiber development stage.
Flowers appear, but fiber quality declines after flowering.

harvesting.harvest_time: At 50% flowering stage (100-120 DAS) for best fiber quality.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut plants at base, tie in bundles, ret in water.

post_harvest_handling: After retting, strip fiber, wash, dry in sun, and bale.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy soil rich in organic matter

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 20 t/ha FYM, form beds.
seed_selection: Hybrid seeds (e.g., Pusa Sawani, Arka Anamika) treated with Trichoderma.
sowing_method: Direct sowing on ridges, 2 seeds per hill, later thin.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate immediately after sowing, then weekly. Critical at flowering and fruiting.
fertilizer_management: Basal: 50 kg N, 30 kg P, 30 kg K + FYM. Top dress with 50 kg N at 30 and 50 DAS.
weed_management: Mulching; hand weeding at 20 and 40 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Shoot and fruit borer: spray emamectin benzoate; yellow vein mosaic: use resistant varieties and control whitefly.

harvesting.harvest_time: 50-55 DAS; pick tender fruits every 3-4 days.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Hand picking with stalk.

post_harvest_handling: Grading, packing in mesh bags, store at 10-12°C.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy to clay loam

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 10 t/ha FYM, level field.
seed_selection: Hybrid seeds (e.g., Deccan 103, Ganga-11) treated with fungicide.
sowing_method: Line sowing on ridges or flat beds; seed rate 20-25 kg/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate at critical stages: knee-high, tasseling, silking, grain filling. 5-6 irrigations.
fertilizer_management: Apply 120 kg N, 60 kg P, 40 kg K per ha. Basal: half N + full P,K; top dress at 30 and 60 DAS.
weed_management: Pre-emergence atrazine + hand weeding at 30 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Stem borer: carbofuran granules in whorl; leaf blight: mancozeb spray.

harvesting.harvest_time: When husk turns brown and grains hard (110-120 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Hand pick cobs, shell grains.

post_harvest_handling: Dry grains to 12-14% moisture, store in bins.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy to sandy loam

land_preparation: Dig pits 1x1x1 m, fill with top soil + 20 kg FYM + 1 kg SSP.
seed_selection: Grafted seedlings of varieties (e.g., Alphonso, Dasheri, Banganapalli).
sowing_method: Plant grafted seedlings in pits during June-July.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate weekly in dry months; critical during flowering and fruit development. Stop irrigation 2-3 months before flowering for stress induction.
fertilizer_management: Apply FYM 50 kg, N 500 g, P 250 g, K 600 g per tree per year in two splits (June and Oct).
weed_management: Basin weeding and mulching.
pest_and_disease_management: Mango hopper: imidacloprid; powdery mildew: wettable sulfur; fruit fly: bait traps.

growth_stages.description: First 4 years: tree establishment and growth.

harvesting.harvest_time: When fruits mature (April-June); harvest at firm green stage for distant market.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Hand picking with stem using pole harvester.

post_harvest_handling: De-sap, wash, grade, pack in boxes. Ripen with ethylene if needed.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy to sandy loam

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, level field.
seed_selection: Certified seeds of varieties like Pusa Vishal, SML 668; treat with Rhizobium.
sowing_method: Line sowing or broadcasting; seed rate 15-20 kg/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate at branching, flowering and pod filling if no rain.
fertilizer_management: Apply 20 kg N, 40 kg P, 20 kg K per ha as basal.
weed_management: Pre-emergence Pendimethalin + hand weeding at 30 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Pod borer: spray quinalphos; yellow mosaic virus: use resistant varieties.

harvesting.harvest_time: When pods turn black (80-90 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Pull plants, sun dry, thresh.

post_harvest_handling: Clean, dry grains, store in bags.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy soil rich in organic matter

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 25 t/ha FYM, form raised beds.
seed_selection: Certified seeds (e.g., Agrifound Dark Red, Pusa Red) or sets.
sowing_method: Nursery raising; transplant 6-8 week old seedlings; seed rate 8-10 kg/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Light irrigation after transplant, then weekly. Stop irrigation 2 weeks before harvest.
fertilizer_management: Apply 100 kg N, 50 kg P, 80 kg K + FYM. Basal: half N + full P,K; top dress at 30 and 50 DAT.
weed_management: Pre-emergence Pendimethalin + hand weeding at 40 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Thrips: dimethoate; purple blotch: mancozeb spray.

harvesting.harvest_time: When tops fall over and bulbs mature (130-150 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Uproot, leave in field for curing, then cut tops.

post_harvest_handling: Cure in shade for 2-3 weeks, grade, store in ventilated structures.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy to sandy loam

land_preparation: Dig pits 1x1x1 m, fill with top soil + 20 kg FYM + 1 kg SSP.
seed_selection: Budded plants on rough lemon rootstock (e.g., Nagpur Mandarin, Coorg Mandarin).
sowing_method: Plant budded plants in pits during June-July.
irrigation_schedule: Drip irrigation daily in summer, weekly in winter. Critical during flowering and fruit development.
fertilizer_management: Apply FYM 50 kg, N 600 g, P 200 g, K 400 g per tree per year in two splits (June and Oct).
weed_management: Basin weeding and mulching.
pest_and_disease_management: Citrus leaf miner: imidacloprid; fruit fly: bait traps; gummosis: scrape and apply Bordeaux paste.

growth_stages.description: Fruit set, growth, and ripening (harvest Nov-Jan).

harvesting.harvest_time: When fruits develop characteristic colour and TSS (Nov-Jan).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Hand picking with clippers, avoid stem puncture.

post_harvest_handling: Wash, treat with fungicide, wax, grade, pack in boxes.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy soil rich in organic matter

land_preparation: Plough deeply, dig pits 60x60x60 cm, fill with top soil + 15 kg FYM.
seed_selection: Certified seeds of varieties like Pusa Delicious, Red Lady (hybrid).
sowing_method: Nursery raising; transplant 2-month old seedlings in pits.
irrigation_schedule: Drip irrigation daily in summer, weekly in winter. Critical during flowering and fruit development.
fertilizer_management: Apply 20 kg FYM, 250 g N, 250 g P, 500 g K per plant per year in four splits.
weed_management: Mulching and hand weeding.
pest_and_disease_management: Papaya mealybug: imidacloprid; mosaic virus: control aphids and remove infected plants; root rot: drench with copper fungicide.

growth_stages.description: Rapid growth, flowering starts at 4-6 months.

harvesting.harvest_time: Fruits mature 9-11 months after planting; harvest when 1/4 yellow.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Hand twist or cut with stalk.

post_harvest_handling: Ripen at 20-25°C; store at 10°C.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained sandy loam rich in organic matter

land_preparation: Plough, form raised beds or contour planting on slopes; add 25 t/ha FYM.
seed_selection: Suckers or crown slips from varieties like Kew, Queen.
sowing_method: Plant suckers in beds during June-July.
spacing: 60 cm x 30 cm (double row) or 90 x 30 cm.
irrigation_schedule: Drip irrigation; keep soil moist, especially during fruit development.
fertilizer_management: Apply 500 kg N, 200 kg P, 600 kg K per ha per year in splits every 3-4 months.
weed_management: Mulching with plastic or straw; hand weeding.
pest_and_disease_management: Mealybugs: imidacloprid; heart rot: drench with copper oxychloride.

harvesting.harvest_time: When fruits turn yellow (15-18 months after planting).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut fruit with stalk, leave crown intact.

post_harvest_handling: Cool immediately, pack in crates, store at 7-10°C.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained sandy loam to loam

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 25 t/ha FYM, form ridges and furrows.
seed_selection: Certified disease-free tubers (e.g., Kufri Jyoti, Kufri Bahar).
sowing_method: Plant whole or cut tubers (with 2-3 eyes) in ridges; seed rate 2-2.5 t/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Light irrigation after planting, then weekly. Critical at tuber initiation and bulking.
fertilizer_management: Apply 120 kg N, 80 kg P, 120 kg K + FYM. Basal: half N + full P,K; top dress at 30 DAS.
weed_management: Pre-emergence metribuzin + earthing up at 40 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Late blight: mancozeb spray; tuber moth: avoid deep planting and harvest early.

harvesting.harvest_time: When tops dry and skin set (110-130 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Dig with spade or potato digger, collect tubers.

post_harvest_handling: Cure in shade for a week, grade, store in cool, dark place.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained sandy loam to loam

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 20 t/ha FYM, form pits or raised beds.
seed_selection: Hybrid seeds (e.g., Arka Suryamukhi, Pusa Vikas) treated with Trichoderma.
sowing_method: Direct sowing in pits, 2-3 seeds per pit, later thin.
irrigation_schedule: Weekly irrigation; critical at flowering and fruit set. Mulch to conserve moisture.
fertilizer_management: Basal: 50 kg N, 30 kg P, 30 kg K + FYM. Top dress with 50 kg N at 30 and 50 DAS.
weed_management: Mulching; hand weeding at 30 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Fruit fly: pheromone traps; powdery mildew: sulfur spray.

harvesting.harvest_time: When fruits mature and skin hardens (90-120 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut fruit with stalk using knife.

post_harvest_handling: Store in cool dry place; can be kept for months.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained sandy loam rich in organic matter

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 20 t/ha FYM, form raised beds.
seed_selection: Certified seeds of varieties like Pusa Chetki, Pusa Himani.
sowing_method: Direct sowing on ridges or flat beds; seed rate 10-12 kg/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Light irrigation after sowing, then every 5-7 days. Avoid water stress for quality roots.
fertilizer_management: Apply 50 kg N, 30 kg P, 30 kg K + FYM as basal. Top dress with 25 kg N at 30 DAS.
weed_management: Hand weeding at 20 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Aphids: dimethoate; leaf spot: mancozeb.

harvesting.harvest_time: When roots are tender (40-60 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Pull roots by hand.

post_harvest_handling: Trim tops, wash, pack in bags, store at 0°C with high humidity.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy to red soils

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, level field.
seed_selection: Certified seeds of varieties like GPU-28, MR-1.
sowing_method: Broadcasting or line sowing; seed rate 8-10 kg/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Rainfed; if irrigated, at critical stages: tillering, flowering, grain filling.
fertilizer_management: Apply 40 kg N, 20 kg P, 20 kg K per ha. Basal: half N + full P,K; top dress at 30 DAS.
weed_management: Hand weeding at 20 and 40 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Blast: tricyclazole spray; shoot fly: carbofuran.

harvesting.harvest_time: When ears turn brown and grains hard (100-110 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut ears, dry, thresh.

post_harvest_handling: Dry grains to 12% moisture, store.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy to clay loam

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, level field.
seed_selection: Certified seeds of varieties like Pusa Bold, RLM 619.
sowing_method: Line sowing or broadcasting; seed rate 5-6 kg/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate at flowering and siliqua filling; avoid water stress.
fertilizer_management: Apply 80 kg N, 40 kg P, 40 kg K per ha. Basal: half N + full P,K; top dress at 30 DAS.
weed_management: Pre-emergence Pendimethalin + hand weeding at 30 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Aphids: imidacloprid; white rust: metalaxyl spray.

harvesting.harvest_time: When pods turn yellow and seeds hard (110-120 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut plants, dry, thresh.

post_harvest_handling: Clean, dry seeds to 8% moisture, store in bags.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Clay loam with good water retention

land_preparation: Puddle field with 2-3 ploughings in standing water, level.
seed_selection: Certified seeds of high-yielding varieties (e.g., Pusa 44, MTU 1010).
sowing_method: Transplanting 25-30 day old seedlings in puddled field; seed rate 25-30 kg/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Maintain 2-5 cm standing water throughout crop growth; drain before harvest.
fertilizer_management: Apply 120 kg N, 60 kg P, 60 kg K per ha. Basal: half N + full P,K; top dress at tillering and panicle initiation.
weed_management: Pre-emergence butachlor + hand weeding at 30 DAT.
pest_and_disease_management: Stem borer: carbofuran; blast: tricyclazole; bacterial blight: resistant varieties.

harvesting.harvest_time: When grains turn golden and moisture 20-25% (135-150 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Manual harvesting with sickle or combine.

post_harvest_handling: Thresh, dry grains to 14% moisture, store in bins.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy soil

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, level field.
seed_selection: Certified seeds of varieties like JS-335, NRC-37; treat with Rhizobium.
sowing_method: Line sowing; seed rate 60-80 kg/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate at flowering and pod filling if dry; avoid waterlogging.
fertilizer_management: Apply 20 kg N, 60 kg P, 40 kg K per ha as basal.
weed_management: Pre-emergence Pendimethalin + hand weeding at 30 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Girdle beetle: spray quinalphos; leaf spot: mancozeb.

harvesting.harvest_time: When leaves yellow and pods turn brown (100-110 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut plants, dry, thresh.

post_harvest_handling: Dry seeds to 12% moisture, store in bags.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained sandy loam to clay loam

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, level field.
seed_selection: Hybrid seeds (e.g., DRSH-1, KBSH-44) treated with fungicide.
sowing_method: Line sowing; seed rate 5-6 kg/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate at critical stages: seedling, flowering, seed filling. 3-4 irrigations.
fertilizer_management: Apply 60 kg N, 40 kg P, 30 kg K per ha. Basal: half N + full P,K; top dress at 30 DAS.
weed_management: Pre-emergence Pendimethalin + hand weeding at 30 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Helicoverpa: spray emamectin; rust: mancozeb.

harvesting.harvest_time: When back of head turns yellow and seeds hard (100-110 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Cut heads, dry, thresh.

post_harvest_handling: Dry seeds to 9% moisture, store in cool place.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained sandy loam

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 10 t/ha FYM, form ridges.
seed_selection: Vine cuttings (30 cm long) from healthy plants of varieties like Sree Bhadra, Sankar.
sowing_method: Plant cuttings on ridges at 45° angle, leaving 2-3 leaves above ground.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate after planting, then weekly. Stop 2 weeks before harvest.
fertilizer_management: Apply 50 kg N, 30 kg P, 60 kg K per ha. Basal: half N + full P,K; top dress at 30 DAS.
weed_management: Hand weeding at 30 and 50 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Weevil: dip cuttings in chlorpyriphos; leaf spot: mancozeb.

harvesting.harvest_time: When tubers are mature (100-120 DAS).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Dig out tubers, avoid damage.

post_harvest_handling: Cure at 30°C for a week, store in cool dry place.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy soil rich in organic matter

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 25 t/ha FYM, form beds.
seed_selection: Hybrid seeds (e.g., Arka Vikas, Pusa Ruby) treated with Trichoderma.
sowing_method: Nursery raising; transplant 4-5 week old seedlings.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate immediately after transplant, then weekly. Critical at flowering and fruit set. Drip preferred.
fertilizer_management: Apply 120 kg N, 80 kg P, 80 kg K + FYM. Basal: half N + full P,K; top dress at 30 and 50 DAT.
weed_management: Mulching; hand weeding at 30 DAT.
pest_and_disease_management: Fruit borer: emamectin benzoate; leaf curl: control whitefly; early blight: mancozeb.

harvesting.harvest_time: When fruits turn red/ripe (70-90 DAT); harvest every 3-4 days.
harvesting.harvesting_method: Hand picking with stalk.

post_harvest_handling: Grade, pack in crates, store at 10-12°C.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained sandy loam or loamy soil rich in organic matter

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, add 25 t/ha FYM, form raised beds or ridges.
seed_selection: Healthy rhizomes with good sprouts (e.g., varieties like Erode local, Salem).
sowing_method: Plant rhizome bits (5-7 cm) on ridges, 5 cm deep; seed rate 2-2.5 t/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate after planting, then weekly. Critical during tillering and rhizome development.
fertilizer_management: Apply 120 kg N, 60 kg P, 120 kg K per ha. Basal: half N + full P,K; top dress at 60 and 120 DAS.
weed_management: Mulching; hand weeding at 60 and 120 DAS.
pest_and_disease_management: Rhizome rot: drench with copper oxychloride; leaf blotch: mancozeb.

harvesting.harvest_time: When leaves turn yellow and dry (8-9 months after planting).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Dig clumps, separate rhizomes.

post_harvest_handling: Boil rhizomes, dry in sun, polish to get dry turmeric.

soil_requirements.soil_type: Well-drained loamy to clay loam

land_preparation: Plough to fine tilth, level field.
seed_selection: Certified seeds of varieties like HD 2967, PBW 343; treat with fungicide.
sowing_method: Line sowing or drilling; seed rate 100-125 kg/ha.
irrigation_schedule: Irrigate at crown root initiation, tillering, jointing, flowering, and grain filling (5-6 irrigations).
fertilizer_management: Apply 120 kg N, 60 kg P, 40 kg K per ha. Basal: half N + full P,K; top dress at 30 and 60 DAS.
weed_management: Pre-emergence Pendimethalin or sulfosulfuron + hand weeding.
pest_and_disease_management: Aphids: dimethoate; rust: propiconazole; use resistant varieties.

harvesting.harvest_time: When straw turns yellow and grains hard (April).
harvesting.harvesting_method: Combine or manual harvesting with sickle.

post_harvest_handling: Thresh, clean, dry grains to 12% moisture, store in bins.
